monogr.title: The housholders philosophie : VVherein is perfectly and profitably described, the true oeconomia and forme of housekeeping. With a table added thereunto of all the notable thinges therein contained. First written in Italian by that excellent orator and poet Signior Torquato Tasso, and now translated by T.K. Whereunto is anexed a dairie booke for all good huswiues
monogr.author: Tasso, Torquato

keywords.term: Agriculture, viticulture, texts on hunting, veterinary science

div.head: ❧ To the worshipfull and vertuous Gentleman Maister Thomas Reade Esquier, health and all happines.

lg.l: WOrth more then this digested thus in haste,
Yet truely set according to the sence,
Plaine and vnpollished for making waste,
Of that which Tassos pen so highly gracde,
This worke I dedicat to your defence.
Let others carpe, tis your discretion

div.signed: Your worships most affectionate T. K.
